title: How to Turn Your Feed Into a Google Gadget - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Does everyone have a Google gadget except you? Here is what you do.1) Go to the Google gadget directory 2) Click the little link that says "Add by URL"3) Enter your feed URL and click "Add"You are finished, your feed is now a Google gadget....
content: How to Turn Your Feed Into a Google Gadget Search Engines P By: Patrick Sexton July 16, 2007 This YouMoz entry was submitted by one of our community members. The author’s views are entirely their own (excluding an unlikely case of hypnosis) and may not reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! P By: Patrick Sexton July 16, 2007 How to Turn Your Feed Into a Google Gadget Search Engines This YouMoz entry was submitted by one of our community members. The author’s views are entirely their own (excluding an unlikely case of hypnosis) and may not reflect the views of Moz. Does everyone have a Google gadget except you? Here is what you do: 1) Go to the Google gadget directory 2) Click the little link that says "Add by URL" 3) Enter your feed URL and click "Add" You are finished, your feed is now a Google gadget. - Patrick Sexton, SEOish.com Copied!
